title: (x) Thorn-like gothic style "The Face of Solstice" - Starstruck {Mike F}
content:
Curious if this an available font or a custom job.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [faceofsolstice.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220236/http:/typophile.com/files/faceofsolstice.jpg) | 37.99 KB |
author: psychopomp

comments.content: It's [Starstruck](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220236/http:/www.dafont.com/en/search.php?q=starstruck&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=FACE+SOLSTICE&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) – a font derived, it seems, from the four letters CHER which appeared on some of that lady's albums.
